headline: 4 Stocks to Buy for a Potential “Summer Panic”
summary: Tom Yeung here with your Sunday Digest. Last month, I wrote about five stocks to “buy the dip.” Our quantitative systems signaled April’s selloff had gone too far and that low prices would be enough to trigger a market rally. Since then, these five firms have performed splendidly, largely outperforming the S&P 500’s 8% rise. InvestorPlace - Stock Market News, Stock Advice & Trading Tips Salesforce Inc. (CRM) +16% Akamai Technologies Inc. (AKAM) +13% Advanced Micro Devices Inc. (AMD) +16% Moderna
